name: Football Juggle - Kick and Flick Soccer Ball Strategy Challenge
name_original: Football Juggle - Kick and Flick Soccer Ball Strategy Challenge
description:
The best juggling game out there! Master BOTH players' juggling skills!


How many times can you juggle the ball? "Zero", you say? Then try again, you might get one.

Soccer Ball Juggle is the hardest game you will ever play! With it's near-impossible gameplay and it's crisp throwback graphics; This Is How Gaming Is Supposed To Be!
